mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_member_account_flow ( flow_no, account_id, order_no, before_amount, after_amount, out_amount, income_amount, change_time, type, remark, status ) VALUES ( #{flowNo}, #{accountId}, #{orderNo}, #{beforeAmount}, #{afterAmount}, #{outAmount}, #{incomeAmount}, #{changeTime}, #{type}, #{remark}, #{status} )
